text: The Dead Alive, also called John Jago's Ghost, is a novella written in 1874 by Wilkie Collins based on the Boorn Brothers murder case. It was reprinted with a side-by-side examination of the case by Rob Warden in 2005 by Northwestern Press. ==Radio adaptation== The Dead Alive was presented on Suspense March 9, 1953. The 30-minute adaptation starred Herbert Marshall. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2005 British novels Category:Crime novels Category:Non-fiction crime books Category:Novels by Wilkie Collins
title: The Dead Alive
